Articles.Content:
so uhm this is new for me but my game keeps crashing while loading the game

kw rocketery

Gameslinx's Planet Overhaul

the most typical reason for the game to crash on loading is "the mods are incompatible with the ksp version"

you didn't post a log, so please read the "how to get support" on the forum. as it is the best way to seek help(https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/83212-how-to-get-support-read-first/)

start by removing all mods the add in only updated mods.. the ksp will update thru steam and now need mod support. you can revert to the older version as well

hope this helps

Jammer
